Function reference

version 0.2.2.9000

All functions

accumulate accumulate_right

Accumulate recursive folds across a list

along list_along rep_along

Helper to create vectors with matching length.

array-coercion array_branch array_tree

Coerce array to list

as_mapper as_function get_attr as_mapper.attr as_mapper.character as_mapper.numeric as_mapper.list

Convert an object into a mapper function

as_vector simplify simplify_all

Coerce a list to a vector

compose

Compose multiple functions

cross cross2 cross3 cross_df cross_n cross_d

Produce all combinations of list elements

depth

Compute the depth of a vector

detect detect_index

Find the value or position of the first match.

every some

Do every or some elements of a list satisfy a predicate?

flatten flatten_lgl flatten_int flatten_dbl flatten_chr flatten_dfr flatten_dfc flatten_df

Flatten a list of lists into a simple vector.

get-attr %@%

Infix attribute accessor

has_element

Does a list contain an object?

head_while tail_while

Find head/tail that all satisfies a predicate.

imap imap_lgl imap_chr imap_int imap_dbl imap_dfr imap_dfc iwalk

Apply a function to each element of a vector, and its index

invoke invoke_map invoke_map_lgl invoke_map_int invoke_map_dbl invoke_map_chr invoke_map_dfr invoke_map_dfc invoke_map_df map_call

Invoke functions.

keep discard compact

Keep or discard elements using a predicate function.

lift lift lift_dl lift_dv lift_vl lift_vd lift_ld lift_lv

Lift the domain of a function

list_modify list_update update_list

Modify a list

lmap lmap_if lmap_at

Apply a function to list-elements of a list

map map_lgl map_chr map_int map_dbl map_dfr map_df map_dfc walk

Apply a function to each element of a vector

map2 map2_lgl map2_int map2_dbl map2_chr map2_dfr map2_dfc map2_df walk2 pmap pmap_lgl pmap_int pmap_dbl pmap_chr pmap_dfr pmap_dfc pmap_df pwalk

Map over multiple inputs simultaneously.

modify modify_if modify_at modify_depth map_if map_at at_depth

Modify elements "in-place"

negate

Negate a predicate function.

null-default %||%

Default value for <code>NULL</code>.

partial

Partial apply a function, filling in some arguments.

prepend

Prepend a vector

rbernoulli

Generate random samples from a Bernoulli distribution

rdunif

Generate random samples from a discrete uniform distribution

reduce reduce_right reduce2 reduce2_right

Reduce a list to a single value by iteratively applying a binary function.

rerun

Re-run expressions multiple times.

safely quietly possibly auto_browse

Capture side effects.

set_names

Set names in a vector

splice

Splice objects and lists of objects into a list

transpose zip_n zip2 zip3

Transpose a list.

when

Match/validate a set of conditions for an object and continue with the action associated with the first valid match.

purrr is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
